fields.title: Text
fields.desc: A simple text mode which allows you to keep your typing speed good or even increase it. You will see a text which you should type as fast as you can after clicking 'Start!' button.

fields.title: Word-by-word
fields.desc: A game mode in which the text is being typed word-by-word making user not able to memorize all the text and type it while looking on keyboard.
